channel.title: Free Games Finders RSS Feed
channel.description: Events and Announcements for Free Games Finders

item.title: Oddworld: New 'n' Tasty free from Epic Games store
item.description:
Day two of the fifteen days of Epic is Oddworld: New 'n' Tasty.

Link[www.epicgames.com]

Details:
- Account/DRM required: Epic Games with 2FA? (NOT Steam)
- Offer good through December 19, 1600 GMT
- Steam Store Page for evaluation.

For those who came in late, Epic is giving away a game every day for the next two weeks. Each one will be available for just 24 hours so make sure you check in frequently and act quickly if you see something you want.

Tomorrow: Check the wrapping paper design for a possible hint.

LH
New is a relative term for a 2015 game but it's still Tasty
item.author: LH

item.title: Cities: Skylines free from Epic Games store
item.description:
Epic's fifteen days of Christmas begins now and it's starting with a free copy of Cities: Skylines.

Link[www.epicgames.com]

Details:
- Account/DRM required: Epic Games with 2FA? (NOT Steam)
- Offer good through December 18, 1600 GMT
- Steam Store Page for evaluation.

For the next two weeks, Epic is giving away a game a day. Each one will be available for just 24 hours so make sure you check in frequently and act quickly if you see something you want.

Tomorrow: Another mystery. There may be a hint in the wrapping paper design.

LH
And we're off...
item.author: LH

item.title: Trials Rising: Standard Edition free from Ubisoft Connect
item.description:
It's day four of Ubisoft's week of holiday giveaways and we're getting another full game. You have 24 hours to claim your copy of Trials Rising: Standard Edition on Ubisoft Connect.

https://register.ubisoft.com/happyholidays2020-day4/en-US
(or claim through the Ubisoft Connect client)

Details:
- Account/DRM required: Ubisoft Connect (NOT Steam)
- Offer good through December 18, 1300 GMT
- Steam Store Page for evaluation.

FYI: The final giveaway is most likely going to be Hyperscape DLC.

LH
Yeah, they actually try to put an Â® on "Trials"
item.author: LH

item.title: Any one free Big Fish game from Big Fish (new code)
item.description:
It's that time again! Have another code good for any game in the Big Fish catalog.

Details:
- Account Required: Big Fish
- DRM Required: Big Fish launcher App (NOT Steam)
- Limited time offer, end date unknown

Codes:
- FREEGAME187131

As always, to claim a game add it to your cart from the Big Fish website[www.bigfishgames.com], deselect the "Big Fish Game Club Free Trial" box from the checkout page, then enter the code and place your order. This is NOT a Steam key and it will require you to install the Big Fish launcher app.

We can hope for a second code today but don't hold your breath. Check back here in a while see if we got lucky.

LH
Running out of HOGs? I don't think so.
item.author: LH

item.title: Prison Architect (DRM-free) free from GOG
item.description:
The GOG Winter sale is here and it's kicking off with a free copy of Prison Architect.

(banner near the top of the page)[www.gog.com]
GOG store page[www.gog.com]

Details:
- Accounts required: GOG.com with e-mail marketing accepted
- DRM-Free once claimed (NOT Steam)
- Offer good thru December 19, 1400 GMT
- Steam Store Page for evaluation.

The GOG sale runs through January fourth so we may get one or two more goodies from them. We'll have to see. This is probably the start of a very big freebie Christmas.

LH
Get busy gaming or get busy dying.
item.author: LH

item.title: Starlink: Battle for Atlas free from Ubisoft Connect
item.description:
Day two of Ubisoft's week of holiday giveaways is actually a full game. You have 24 hours to claim your copy of Starlink: Battle for Atlas on Ubisoft Connect.

https://register.ubisoft.com/happyholidays2020-day2/en-US
(or claim through the Uplay client)

Details:
- Account/DRM required: Ubisoft Connect (NOT Steam)
- Offer good through December 16, 1300 GMT
- Steam Store Page for evaluation.

It's not immediately clear which version of the game this is. Details will be added as they are discovered. It also appears that these really are one day only offers (you can't still claim yesterday's AC:V DLC) so don't wait around to grab them.

CyMonk was awake and linked in when this one went live. Thanks!

LH
As far as I'm concerned, Star Link is the captain of the Swinetrek.
item.author: LH

item.title: Tyranny -and- Pillars of Eternity free from Epic Games Store
item.description:
Waiting for a 43.5G download to finish? Why not duck over to the Epic store and claim your free copies of Tyranny: Gold Edition and Pillars of Eternity - Definitive Edition?

Tyranny Link[www.epicgames.com]
Pillars of Eternity Link[www.epicgames.com]

Details:
- Account/DRM required: Epic Games (NOT Steam)
- Offer good through December 17, 1600 GMT
- Tyranny Steam Store Page for evaluation.
- Pillars of Eternity Steam Store Page for evaluation.

Next week: A mystery game. Oh. We're back to doing that are we?

UPDATE: To be specific, starting next week there will be FIFTEEN days of free games from Epic. Each game will be available for only 24 hours.

LH
So, you're saying that there are other things happening today too?
item.author: LH

item.title: Seven: Enhanced Edition free for GOG From Humble Bundle
item.description:
Another GOG free Enhanced Edition. This time, it's Seven. No, the game "Seven" and you can claim it by linking your GOG account to your Humble Bundle account.

Humble Freebie page[www.humblebundle.com]

Details:
- Accounts required: GOG.com and Humble Bundle (linked)
- DRM-Free once claimed (NOT Steam)
- Offer good thru December 9, 1800 GMT (or while supplies last)
- Steam Store Page for evaluation.

Click the "get the game" button and it will prompt/guide you if you need to link your accounts.

LH
I guess that's one way to keep Steam from copying your key giveaways
item.author: LH

item.title: Any one free Big Fish game from Big Fish (new code)
item.description:
Well, we waited all day and a second code never appeared. Perhaps this time it is just going to be one free game of your choice from the Big Fish store.

Details:
- Account Required: Big Fish
- DRM Required: Big Fish launcher App (NOT Steam)
- Limited time offer, end date unknown

Code:
- FREEGAME110592

As always, to claim a game add it to your cart from the Big Fish website[www.bigfishgames.com], deselect the "Big Fish Game Club Free Trial" box from the checkout page, then enter the code and place your order. This is NOT a Steam key and it will require you to install the Big Fish launcher app.

Check back here in a day or so to see if a second code ever dropped.

LH
One fish, TWO fish. Everyone knows that. C'mon.
item.author: LH

item.title: The Witcher: Enhanced Edition Director's Cut free on GOG Galaxy
item.description:
It looks like GOG is now including a free copy of The Witcher: Enhanced Edition Director's Cut with their Galaxy client for anyone who opts in to their mailing list.

GOG news article[www.gog.com]

Details:
- Account required: GOG.com with Galaxy client
- DRM-Free once claimed (NOT Steam)
- Steam Store Page for evaluation.

There's no specified end date for this offer. It may be forever, it may stop suddenly. They've given this one out a lot before but if you don't have it, don't risk it. Claim it quickly.

LH
----->
item.author: LH
